title: Rose Park Residencies Wattala
details:
1400 Sq. Ft. 03 Bedroom Apartments and 02 Bathrooms

Come visit our Show Apartment on Site!

Living, Dining, Pantry, Storeroom

All Rooms Air Conditioned, LED Lighting, Solid Wood Doors, Elegant Tiling etc

Freehold Title and Deed, Loans can be arranged!
Building 80% Complete, Move in December 2018
